channel.title: Connect new USB port for loading sample
channel.description: Hi everyone I'm novice in axoloti community I want connect another USB in on my board for loading external sample Lets me know if anyone do that because i try to find solution for disconnecting SDcard port to use my new USB port

item.title: Connect new USB port for loading sample
item.dc:creator: @bartoch Xavier BARTHELEMY
item.description:
@bartoch wrote:

Thx Johannes for your quick reply

Read full topic
item.source: Connect new USB port for loading sample

item.title: Connect new USB port for loading sample
item.dc:creator: @johannes johannes
item.description:
@johannes wrote:

Sorry, the USB host port does not support "storage class devices" like usb flash drives, and I do not plan to add support for that in the future. The reason is that SDcard allows for much better performance.

Read full topic
item.source: Connect new USB port for loading sample
